Class
Description

Represents addition operation.
CalculationException
Exception thrown when calculation fails in mathematical expressions.

Represents division operation.

Class for DivisionByZeroException.
Expression
The class for expressions.
InvalidExpressionException
Thrown when mathematical expression has invalid format or syntax.
Main
The main class.
MathCalculationException
Thrown when mathematical calculation fails due to domain-specific errors.
MathExpressionException
A basic exception for all errors in the design of mathematical expressions.

Represents Multiplication operation.

The class for a number.

The method for the operarions.

Exception for expression parsing errors.

The class for the parser.

Represents substraction operation.
UndefinedVariableException
Thrown when an undefined variable is encountered during expression calculation.
